definition: dagger-axe/abbr. for 戈瑞[ge1 rui4]/(Tw) abbr. for 戈雷[ge1 lei2]
radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 4)/see 撇[pie3]
Gorbachev/Mikhail Sergeyevich Gorbachev (1931-), last president of the Soviet Union 1991-1995
to change sides in a war/turncoat
Gore (name)/Al Gore (1948-), US vice-president 1993-2001 under Bill Clinton, subsequently environmental campaigner and Nobel Peace laureate
to go to war (idiom)/to make a big fuss over sth
wielding the halberd within the household (idiom); internecine strife
lit. to exchange weapons of war for gifts of jade and silk (idiom)/fig. to turn hostility into friendship

definition: Baingoin county, Tibetan: Dpal mgon rdzong, in Nagchu prefecture 那曲地區|那曲地区[Na4 qu3 di4 qu1], central Tibet

sentences.english: This is an improved reliable socialist must face the problem.
sentences.chinese: 這也是戈德曼改良的可靠主義必須要面對的問題。

sentences.english: Gemengda Polaroid light chuckle, but no one o'clock refused to mean.
sentences.chinese: 戈明達寶麗輕笑道，卻沒有一點要拒絕的意思。

sentences.english: Dr Goldmeier uses the analogy of a man confronted by an angry tiger.
sentences.chinese: 戈德梅爾醫生用一頭憤怒的老虎來比喻一個男人。

sentences.english: Every day Goliath came near Saul's camp.
sentences.chinese: 每天戈利亞斯都到薩奧的軍營附近。

sentences.english: The theft had happened many years ago, according to Gregorovitch.
sentences.chinese: 據格里戈維奇的記憶，這次失竊發生在許多年以前。

sentences.english: Captain Gordon was hurried off before I walked to him.
sentences.chinese: 在我走向戈登上尉之前，他就匆匆走開了。

sentences.english: It's all so boring here, Margo - there's nothing but playboys and tennis pros.
sentences.chinese: 馬戈，這太無聊了，除了花花公子就是網球專家。

sentences.english: Gobinda Babu of our school was very dark, and short and fat.
sentences.chinese: 我們學校的戈文達先生是一位皮膚黝黑的矮胖子。

sentences.english: Costa, meanwhile, resumed his role as Flamengo coach.
sentences.chinese: 這期間科斯塔重新當上了弗拉門戈主教練。

sentences.english: Valarey Gevardarsky is with the 110th fire brigade.
sentences.chinese: 戈瓦達爾斯基是第110消防旅的。

sentences.english: Gortat is not only tough and physical, but he can also score.
sentences.chinese: 戈塔特不僅僅是強壯，他還能得分。

sentences.english: "It's the enemy of mindfulness, " says McGonigal.
sentences.chinese: 麥克戈尼格爾說，“多項工作是專注的敵人。”

sentences.english: Barry Goldwater IS the conscience of a conservative.
sentences.chinese: 戈德華特是一個保守的良知。
戈譚市需要一個真正的英雄。

sentences.english: Childrenpractice the art of flamenco at a fair in Barcelona.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們在巴塞羅納集市上練習弗拉門戈藝術。

sentences.english: But the lottery would come and Goldberg wouldn't win.
sentences.chinese: 可是開彩了，戈德堡沒有中。

definition: solemn/reverent/calm/burial position in an ancestral tomb (old)/old variant of 默
abbr. for 梵教[Fan4 jiao4] Brahmanism/abbr. for Sanskrit 梵語|梵语[Fan4 yu3] or 梵文[Fan4 wen2]/abbr. for 梵蒂岡|梵蒂冈[Fan4 di4 gang1], the Vatican
Xuan Yuan, personal name of Huangdi, the Yellow Emperor 黃帝|黄帝[Huang2 di4]
phonetic fei or fi/elegant/phi (Greek letter Φ, φ)
surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)
honored sir (a person of higher status or seniority, or a Buddhist monk)
to approach/to rise high/thick ice/to insult or maltreat
Lianyun district of Lianyungang city 連雲港市|连云港市[Lian2 yun2 gang3 shi4], Jiangsu
Lingyun county in Baise 百色[Bai3 se4], Guangxi
surname Di/generic name for northern ethnic minorities during the Qin and Han Dynasties (221 BC-220 AD)
